description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Aliens are putting you to the test in Mazeoto, a retro style First Person Shooter.  Solve the mazes and fight off alien robots or humanity will be destroyed!
description.short: Aliens are putting you to the test in Mazeoto, a retro style First Person Shooter.  Solve the mazes and fight off alien robots or humanity will be destroyed!
